articles.description: Ben Simmons does not plan to report to the Sixers or play for the team again, sources told ESPN.
articles.content: In a looming standoff that could have lasting implications for the NBA, Philadelphia 76ers All-Star forward Ben Simmons will not report for the opening of training camp next week and intends to never… [+2311 chars]
